tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_history (
    communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    communication_type VARCHAR(20),
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_history (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  communication_type STRING,
  communication_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  communication_content STRING,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
  call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  call_duration INT,
  call_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_transcripts (
  chat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  agent_id INT,
  chat_content TEXT,
  chat_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
    email_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    email_subject VARCHAR(255),
    email_body TEXT,
    email_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
    call_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    caller_number VARCHAR(20),
    call_duration INT,
    call_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_transcripts (
    chat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    chat_text TEXT,
    chat_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  email_content TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  call_duration INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE chat_transcripts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  chat_content TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE support_agents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50)
)
